daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: A major snowstorm is approaching NYC, causing over 2,700 flight delays and cancellations, while outreach teams are working to shelter the homeless ahead of the storm; meanwhile, Broadway's operations may be affected, and a Bronx demolition contractor has been suspended following a building collapse.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Major snowstorm expected to impact NYC; Broadway shows may be affected.
